item.title: Otelize, add OpenTelemetry to your Python project easily
item.author: diegojromerolopez@gmail.com (Diego J. Romero-López)
item.description: Otelize, add OpenTelemetry to your Python project easily OpenTelemetry (sometimes abbreviated as OTEL) is a standard for telemetry and monitorization of software applications that has gain a lot of traction in these last years. We will learn here how to use the Python package otelize to add this telemetry to our Python applications without having to rely on much boilerplate. How did I use to add OTEL telemetry to my Python code?
